item.title: An Old William Lane Craig Debate
item.description:
Whilst looking for some William Lane Craig videos yesterday, I came across this one that I had not seen before.

Hopefully I shall be watching later in the week, I just thought that given the age of the video, it would be interesting to share with others.

After watching, I shall update with my thoughts on the actual debate.
